page.title: 12Stonegate Stores
page.content: Stonegate Stores is a very friendly shop situated at the crossroads in the centre of the village.It is a small shop with steps leading up to it.It is the only shop in the village. Every morning except Sunday the shop opens at 8.30am. On Wednesday and Saturday it closes at 1pm, but on Monday,Tuesday and Friday it closes at 5pm. All types of food are sold - bread, biscuits,ice-creams and lollies.Drinks are also sold.Various items of hardware and stationery can be bought, such as cleaning materials,batteries and birthday cards.There is a corner with sweets for children. Part of the shop is used as a Post Office where stamps and postal orders can be purchased,and letters posted to anywhere in the world. There is also a Savings Bank.
